works.description:
9/24/2012

To whom it may concern,

We believe that your website is unfortunately assisting in the unauthorized  
distribution of content owned by our client, Bas Rutten Enterprises, Inc.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the material described below in  
the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its  
agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information  
in this notification is accurate (limited to the extent of the information  
I have gathered from your site) and that my company has been authorized to  
act on behalf of the copyright owner (based on the information provided by  
my client). As you may know, the laws of most countries ask their citizens  
and corporations to follow policies similar to those instituted by the  
World Intellectual Property Organization Treaty of 1996, which seeks to  
prevent and make illegal any type of copyright violation such as this.

I therefore request that you remove the allegedly infringing content or  
access to the content, which can be found here:

freepdfdownloadallfiles.com/bas_rutten_mma_workout_torrent.html

For reference, my client’s content includes the following:

* Lethal Street Fighting
* Career MMA
* Bas Rutten MMA Workout
* Big DVD of Combat

(These are all fighting instructional videos, the copyright of which is  
owned by my client)

If you have any concerns, my contact information is below. Thank you for  
your attention to this important matter.

Kind regards,

B.E. Ferko
Partner, Web Defense Systems, LLC
Phone: 404-987-5213
Email: content@webdefensesystems.com
Mailing Address:
   1121 Park Overlook Dr NE
   Atlanta, GA 30324
